thread.title: Seven ways to book affordable stays in Napa Valley
thread.title_full: Seven ways to book affordable stays in Napa Valley - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Alec Scott
title: Seven ways to book affordable stays in Napa Valley
text:
Photo: Matthew Millman, Courtesy Of Indian Springs Resor The old-time Indian Springs Resort and Spa has gotten a renovation. The old-time Indian Springs Resort and Spa has gotten a renovation.
I’m driving toward a midweek retreat in Calistoga, and there’s hardly a break in the traffic on Napa’s arterial Highway 29. There are also not many breaks to be had at the hotels in the middle of autumn, high season in Napa. The old-time Indian Springs Resort and Spa has gotten a renovation.
